messages.title: To My Dearest Jerry
messages.content: My beloved Jerry, every day with you feels like a beautiful dream that I never want to wake up from. Your love illuminates my world in ways I never thought possible...

messages.title: My Heart's Home
messages.content: Dearest Soumya, you are not just my valentine, you are my heart's permanent address. In your eyes, I found my home...

messages.title: Good Morning Sunshine
messages.content: Good morning, my beautiful sunshine! I hope your day is as wonderful as you make my life every single day. ðŸ’•

messages.title: One Year of Magic
messages.content: One year ago, we promised to write our love story together. Today, I can say it's the most beautiful story I've ever been part of...

love_quotes.text: In a sea of people, my eyes will always search for you
love_quotes.author: Jerry & Soumya

love_quotes.text: You are my today and all of my tomorrows
love_quotes.author: Anonymous

love_quotes.text: Love is not about how many days, months or years you have been together. It's about how much you love each other every single day
love_quotes.author: Jerry & Soumya

daily_affirmations: Our bond grows stronger with each moment
We are perfect for each other
Our love story is unique and beautiful
We support each other's dreams unconditionally
